channel.title: How to Play Multimedia Files :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: By default, a new Salix installation supports playback of most free video and audio file file formats. If you want to add support for other, non-free formats, you just have to use the Salix Codecs Installer tool. You can either use the GUI tool: Menu -> Multimedia -> Install multimedia codecsor from a terminal, run: sudo salix-codecs-installer
